string.text: Do you play games around here?
Sometimes, yes. Have something in mind?
How about a few hands of Blackjack?
Sure. Get the money ready, and I'll shuffle the cards.
Sure. Let's play.
Great, I'm ready, let's go.
Got some time to kill? How about a game of cards?
Sure!
I'm ready, let's play.
Can't right now, another time.
Another time perhaps.
Nah, not right now.
Do you play games around here?
Yeah?
I see you got a deck of cards there. How about a game of Blackjack?
Alright, let's play!
I'm ready when you are.
Yeah, let's play!
Right now?
Yes!
Hey Cold, do you play games around here?
What is it?
How about a game of cards?
Yeah, sounds good. Get your money ready and we'll play.
Alright!
I'm ready, let's go.
Again?
Yes!
[Blackjack] Grandfather, I wanted to ask you something.
What is it Greenhorn? What do you want?
I noticed you have a deck of cards on the table. Wanna play for money?
Okay. Let's play! Get the money ready, and I'll shuffle the cards.
Already prepared.
That's good, I'm ready too.
Do you play games around here?
Sure, sure. Lots of gambling when it gets dark.
Would you like to play a hand of Blackjack?
Alright, let's play. Get your money out.
Uh-huh, go.
Alright, let's play.
Do you play games around here, Professor?
Well, even I'll endulge in a game every once in a while.
I was wondering if you fancied a game of Blackjack?
Well I have some things I promised to do... but what the hell, I've got time for one game.
Alright, let's do this.
Let's play.
Do you play games around here?
Something you wanted to play?
How about a game of Blackjack?
Alright then, get out your wallet while I shuffle the cards. I hope you brought a lot to lose.
Agreed, I'm ready to play right now.
That's good! Let's play!
What, again?
Yes, again!
Sounds good, let's play.
I'm busy now. Another time.
Another time maybe.
No, I don't want to play.
Do you play games around here?
Quite regularly, yes.
You must have a deck of cards somewhere around here. How about a game?
A point is a point!
Alright, let's go.
Okay, let's play.
How about another game?
Yeah, let's play.
Alright, let's play.
I can't right now. Another time.
Not right now. Later maybe.
Nah, I don't want to play Blackjack right now.
How about we play a few hands?
Sure why not? I'm not doing anything else right now.
How about a few hands of Blackjack?
Yes, come on then. But be warned I bleed your wallet dry.
How about we play a few hands?>
Sure, I don't have any orders now. Let's play.
How about we play some cards?
Sure, let's play. Nobody's buying anything today anyway.
Do you have time to play some cards?
Yeah it's dead around here. Let's play.
How about a few hands of Blackjack?
